caption.title: Seroreactivity achieved using different vaccination strategies.
caption.p: Seroreactivity against crude total Leishmania antigen (CTLA) 20 weeks after Leishmania infantum challenge in hamsters vaccinated with KMPII, TRYP, LACK, and PAPLE22. C: Control; PROT: Raw extracts of Trichoplusia ni larvae producing recombinant proteins; DNA: Naked plasmid DNA; DNA-PROT: Both vaccines combined in a prime-boost strategy. The dotted line shows the cut-off value.
